dependencies.name: Spring Boot DevTools
dependencies.description: Provides fast application restarts, LiveReload, and configurations for enhanced development experience

dependencies.name: Lombok
dependencies.description: Java annotation library which helps to reduce boilerplate code and code faster

dependencies.name: Spring Configuration Processor
dependencies.description: Generate metadata for developers to offer contextual help and “code completion” when working with custom configuration keys (ex.application.properties/.yml files)

dependencies.name: Spring Session
dependencies.description: Provides an API and implementations for managing a user session information

dependencies.name: Spring Web
dependencies.description: Build web, including RESTful, applications using Spring MVC. Uses Tomcat as the default embedded container

dependencies.name: Reactive Web
dependencies.description: Reactive web applications with Spring WebFlux and Netty

dependencies.name: Rest Repositories
dependencies.description: Exposing Spring Data repositories over REST via Spring Data REST

dependencies.name: Rest Repositories HAL Browser
dependencies.description: Browsing Spring Data REST repositories in your browser

dependencies.name: Spring HATEOAS
dependencies.description: Eases the creation of RESTful APIs that follow the HATEOAS principle when working with Spring / Spring MVC.

dependencies.name: Spring Web Services
dependencies.description: Facilitates contract-first SOAP development. Allows for the creation of flexible web services using one of the many ways to manipulate XML payloads.

dependencies.name: Jersey
dependencies.description: Framework for developing RESTful Web Services in Java that provides support for JAX-RS APIs.

dependencies.name: Spring REST Docs
dependencies.description: Document RESTful services by combining hand-written with Asciidoctor and auto-generated snippets produced with Spring MVC Test.

dependencies.name: Vaadin
dependencies.description: Java framework for building rich client apps based on Web components

dependencies.name: Apache CXF
dependencies.description: RESTful Web Services with JAX-RS

dependencies.name: Ratpack
dependencies.description: Spring Boot integration for the Ratpack framework

dependencies.name: Spring Mobile
dependencies.description: Framework that provides capabilities to detect the type of device making a request to your Spring web site and serve alternative views based on that device.

dependencies.name: Thymeleaf
dependencies.description: A modern server-side Java template engine for both web and standalone environments.  Allows HTML to be correctly displayed in browsers and as static prototypes.

dependencies.name: Apache Freemarker
dependencies.description: Java library to generate text output (HTML web pages, e-mails, configuration files, source code, etc.) based on templates and changing data.

dependencies.name: Mustache
dependencies.description: Logic-less Templates. There are no if statements, else clauses, or for loops. Instead there are only tags.

dependencies.name: Groovy Templates
dependencies.description: Groovy templating engine

dependencies.name: Spring Security
dependencies.description: Highly customizable authentication and access-control framework for Spring applications

dependencies.name: OAuth2 Client
dependencies.description: Spring Boot integration for Spring Security's OAuth2/OpenID Connect client features

dependencies.name: OAuth2 Resource Server
dependencies.description: Spring Boot integration for Spring Security's OAuth2 resource server features

dependencies.name: LDAP
dependencies.description: Makes it easier to build Spring based applications that use the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP).

dependencies.name: Okta
dependencies.description: Okta specific configuration for Spring Security/Spring Boot OAuth2 features.  Enable your Spring Boot application to work with Okta via OAuth 2.0/OIDC

dependencies.name: Spring Data JPA
dependencies.description: Persist data in SQL stores with Java Persistence API using Spring Data and Hibernate

dependencies.name: MySQL Driver
dependencies.description: MySQL JDBC driver

dependencies.name: PostgreSQL Driver
dependencies.description: An open source JDBC driver that allows Java programs to connect to a PostgreSQL database using standard, database independent Java code.

dependencies.name: MS SQL Server Driver
dependencies.description: A Type 4 JDBC driver that provides access to Microsoft SQL Server and Azure SQL Database from any Java application.

dependencies.name: H2 Database
dependencies.description: Provides a fast in-memory database that supports JDBC API, with a small (2mb) footprint. Supports embedded and server modes as well as a browser based console application.

dependencies.name: HyperSQL Database
dependencies.description: Lightweight 100% Java SQL Database Engine.

dependencies.name: Apache Derby Database
dependencies.description: An open source relational database implemented entirely in Java.

dependencies.name: JDBC API
dependencies.description: Persistence support using JDBC

dependencies.name: MyBatis Framework
dependencies.description: Persistence framework with support for custom SQL, stored procedures and advanced mappings.  MyBatis couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor or annotations.

dependencies.name: Liquibase Migration
dependencies.description: Liquibase database migration and source control library

dependencies.name: Flyway Migration
dependencies.description: Version control for your database so you can migrate from any version (incl. an empty database) to the latest version of the schema.

dependencies.name: JOOQ
dependencies.description: Persistence support using Java Object Oriented Querying

dependencies.name: Spring Data Redis (Access + Driver)
dependencies.description: Advanced and thread-safe Java Redis client for synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive usage. Supports Cluster, Sentinel, Pipelining, Auto-Reconnect, Codecs and much more

dependencies.name: Spring Data Reactive Redis
dependencies.description: Access Redis key-value data stores in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Redis

dependencies.name: Spring Data MongoDB
dependencies.description: Access MongoDB NoSQL Database with Spring Data MongoDB

dependencies.name: Spring Data Reactive MongoDB
dependencies.description: Access MongoDB NoSQL Database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data MongoDB

dependencies.name: Embedded MongoDB Database
dependencies.description: Provides a platform neutral way for running MongoDB in unit tests.

dependencies.name: Spring Data Elasticsearch (Access + Driver)
dependencies.description: Elasticsearch search and analytics engine with Spring Data Elasticsearch

dependencies.name: Spring Data Apache Solr
dependencies.description: Access Apache Solr search platform with Spring Data Solr

dependencies.name: Spring Data Apache Cassandra
dependencies.description: Access Cassandra NoSQL Database with Spring Data Cassandra

dependencies.name: Spring Data Reactive Cassandra
dependencies.description: Access Cassandra NoSQL Database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Cassandra

dependencies.name: Spring Data Couchbase
dependencies.description: Access Couchbase NoSQL database with Spring Data Couchbase

dependencies.name: Spring Data Reactive Couchbase
dependencies.description: Access Couchbase NoSQL database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Couchbase

dependencies.name: Spring Data Neo4j
dependencies.description: Access Neo4j NoSQL graph database with Spring Data Neo4j

dependencies.name: Gemfire
dependencies.description: Access GemFire distributed data store with Spring Data Gemfire

dependencies.name: Spring Integration
dependencies.description: Adds support for Enterprise Integration Patterns. Enables lightweight messaging and supports integration with external systems via declarative adapters.

dependencies.name: Spring for RabbitMQ
dependencies.description: Gives your applications a common platform to send and receive messages, and your messages a safe place to live until received.

dependencies.name: Spring for Apache Kafka
dependencies.description: Kafka messaging support using Spring Kafka

dependencies.name: Spring for Apache Kafka Streams
dependencies.description: Building stream processing applications with Apache Kafka Streams

dependencies.name: Spring for ActiveMQ Classic
dependencies.description: Java Message Service API via Apache ActiveMQ

dependencies.name: Spring for Artemis
dependencies.description: Java Message Service API via Apache Artemis

dependencies.name: Apache Camel
dependencies.description: Camel lets you create the Enterprise Integration Patterns to implement routing and mediation rules a Java based Domain Specific Language via Spring.

dependencies.name: Websocket
dependencies.description: WebSocket applications with SockJS and STOMP

dependencies.name: Spring Batch
dependencies.description: Provides reusable functions for processing large volumes of records. Includes logging/tracing, transaction management, job processing statistics, job restart /skip, resource management, and chunk based processing.

dependencies.name: Spring cache abstraction
dependencies.description: Provides cache-related operations, such as the ability to update the content of the cache, but does not provide the actual data store.

dependencies.name: Java Mail Sender
dependencies.description: Send email using Java Mail and Spring Framework's JavaMailSender

dependencies.name: Quartz Scheduler
dependencies.description: Schedule jobs using Quartz

dependencies.name: Spring Boot Actuator
dependencies.description: Supports built in (or custom) endpoints that let you monitor and manage your application - such as application health, metrics, sessions, etc.

dependencies.name: Actuator Docs
dependencies.description: API documentation for the Actuator endpoints

dependencies.name: Spring Boot Admin (Server)
dependencies.description: A community project to manage and monitor your Spring Boot applications.  Provides a UI on top of the Spring Boot Actuator endpoints.

dependencies.name: Spring Boot Admin (Client)
dependencies.description: Required for your application to register with a Spring Boot Admin Server instance.

dependencies.name: Task
dependencies.description: Allows a user to develop and run short lived microservices using Spring Cloud. Run them locally, in the cloud, and on Spring Cloud Data Flow.

dependencies.name: Function
dependencies.description: Promotes the implementation of business logic via functions and supports a uniform programming model across serverless providers, as well as the ability to run standalone (locally or in a PaaS).

dependencies.name: Cloud Security
dependencies.description: A declarative model which can be heavily configured externally (or centrally) lends itself to the implementation of large systems of co-operating, remote components, usually with a central indentity management service

dependencies.name: Cloud OAuth2
dependencies.description: OAuth2 and distributed application patterns with spring-cloud-security

dependencies.name: Cloud Connectors
dependencies.description: Simplifies the process of connecting to services and gaining operating environment awareness in cloud platforms such as Cloud Foundry and Heroku.

dependencies.name: Open Service Broker
dependencies.description: Framework for building Spring Boot apps that implement the Open Service Broker API, which can deliver services to applications running within cloud native platforms such as Cloud Foundry, Kubernetes, and OpenShift.

dependencies.name: Cloud Contract Verifier
dependencies.description: Moves TDD to the level of software architecture by enabling Consumer Driven Contract (CDC) development.

dependencies.name: Cloud Contract Stub Runner
dependencies.description: Stub Runner for HTTP/Messaging based communication. Allows creating WireMock stubs from RestDocs tests

dependencies.description: Spring Cloud Config Client

dependencies.description: Central management for configuration via Git, SVN, or HashiCorp Vault

dependencies.description: Configuration management with Zookeeper and Spring Cloud Zookeeper Config

dependencies.description: Distributed tracing with an existing Zipkin installation and Spring Cloud Sleuth Zipkin.

dependencies.name: Cloud Bus

dependencies.name: Cloud Stream
dependencies.description: Framework for building highly scalable event-driven microservices connected with shared messaging systems. (Requires a binder, e.g. Kafka or RabbitMQ)

dependencies.description: Spring Security integration with Azure Active Directory for authentication

dependencies.name: GCP Support
dependencies.description: Contains auto-configuration support for every Spring Cloud GCP integration. Most of the auto-configuration code is only enabled if other dependencies are added to the classpath.

dependencies.name: GCP Storage
